title: Eurya的摸鱼集
content:
[[module CSS]]
@import url(http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/eurya-code/code/1);

#header h1 a {
    line-height: 0px;
    max-height: 0px;
    color: transparent;
    text-shadow: none;
    -webkit-user-select: none;
    -moz-user-select: none;
    -ms-user-select: none;
    user-select: none;
}
#header h1 a::before {
    content: "Eurya的艺作页";
    white-space: nowrap;
    color: #efefef;
    text-shadow: 3px 3px 5px #854e4b;
}
 
#header h2 span {
    display: block;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 25px 0;
    line-height: 0px;
    max-height: 0px;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: transparent;
    text-shadow: none;
}
#header h2 span::before {
    content: '一潭浑水';
    color: #efefef;
    text-shadow: 3px 3px 5px #854e4b;
    }

[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]


这里是Eurya用来存放摸鱼成果的地方∠( °ω°)／ 


[[=]]
[[size 150%]]像素gif[[/size]]

可以随意拿走--做表情包--

[[/=]]
